vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.CashOut (patch_9.sol#24-32):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,_am,CashOut) (patch_9.sol#30)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(_am) (patch_9.sol#29)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_9.sol#31)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_VAULT.Deposit (patch_9.sol#15-22):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_9.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_9.sol#21)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: LastMsg in Log.AddMessage (patch_9.sol#49) is a local variable never initialiazed

external-function
